column1: length ball on off, and stays on the stumps. Rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
good length on middle. Cramped for space, and nudged to midwicket
good length, just outside off. Bit of movement away, and extra lift on the way to Carey

smart catch! Weatheraldn you beauty. Swinging away, on a good length, and the attempted drive is sliced to the right of point. Tough chance, but a nice dive, and taken with two hands. Jacks gets a duck
full, just outside off, and a gentle tap past the bowler, past mid off, and Rashid gives the ball a chase
good length on leg, and he stays on the back foot to block
length ball on off, and angling into the batsman's body. Pushed off the back foot to mid on
length ball outside leg, and he taps it with soft hands to the leg side, and off they go for a quick single
full on middle, with the batsman walking down the wicket. Ball swings further in, though, going past the batsman's legs, and through to the keeper
Zahid: 'Jono Wells is a fantastic player, Follow him from last 2 years. He will definitely consider by Australian Selectors soon. '
xgood length, just outside off, and fended towards cover

Short will be disappointed! Not a good ball at all, length ball outside leg stump, and Short wants to flick it behind, but it instead takes a feather-touch to the keeper. Caught down the leg side...one of the worst ways to be dismissed!
full outside off, and he reaches out to drive. Spliced towards mid on
fullish, on off. Defended off the back foot, and takes the edge to third man
fullish, just outside off. Tries to defend, but the edge takes it very fine, allowing Handscomb to come back for the second
another edge past the slip cordon to third man. Worrall goes full on off
full on middle and leg, and flicked past the keeper's left
full on middle, and worked off his pads to midwicket for a single
full just outside off, and hammered to cover, but can't beat the fielder
good length, on middle, and flicked to square leg. They scurry across for a single
beautiful shot Length ball angling in, not short enough to trouble McDermott, and pulled in front of square for four
leading edge goes just over flrst slip! Tried to nudge this ball to the leg side, but it goes the other way. Third man cleans up
soft edge! ANd the Hurricanes are three down. This was a length ball outside off, and the batsman went fishing outside for it. Into the hands of Carey and the Strikers are roaring and how!
length ball on leg, and angling into middle. Defended off the back foot to midwicket
some extra bounce off good length. Ingram shaped up to pull but got surprised by the extra bounce. Through to the keeper
back of a length, outside off, and he pulls to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
great ball in the channel just outside off, and the ball goes just past the outside edge of Ingram
good length, on middle. Too close to cut, and the ball hits his handle. Rolls away towards the off side
fullish, outside off, and he slaps a cut to deep point
legcutter on off stump. McDermott looks to drive from middle stump but the ball snakes away, past his edge, and through to Carey.
good length on middle. Wants to drive, but the ball hits the top half of his bat. Dribbles away to mid on, and intercepted by the fielder
full on middle, and darting into his pads. Flicked to deep midwicket
full on off, and he makes room before slapping this full ball to deep point
fullish ball on middle. Angling into the stumps. Pushed to mid on
full and wide outside off. Makes room and clatters to long off
full on off, and Ingram comes down the wicket for the big shot. But mistimes it to long on
massive! full on leg, and he opens his stance before muscling a six over deep midwicket!
back of a length, outside off, but not quick enough. Stands tall, on the back foot, and then flat-bats a clattered shot over the non striker's head
good length, on middle. Swivels to pull along the ground. Fine leg cleans up
good length ball angling into the stumps. Nudged to midwicket for a quick run
good length, from around the wicket. Lands outside off, and he wants to punch it square, but mistimed back to the bowler
good length, on middle. Swivels and pulls, this time squarer than before. Nobody stopping that
good length, outside off, and cut to point
full on leg, and nudged to midwicket
length ball on middle. Punches the googly to long on
full on off, and the attempted drive takes an inside edge, and goes behind square on the leg side insteac. Enough time to take the second
full outside off, and he clobbers a drive. But finds the fielder
good length, on middle. Goes onto the back foot and defends it back to Rashid
good length, outside off. This one's a legbreak, and he flat-bats a shot past the bowler to long on
inside out over extra cover! Not letting Briggs settle. Full outside off, and he hammers this over extra cover
drops his length slightly. Works it away to deep midwicket
full on leg, and drilled to long on
full, on leg stump. Struck to wide long on
going, going, gone! Full on leg, and Ingram skips down the wicket before hitting it over Briggs' head
yorker, on off. Dug into his pads. Fifteen runs off the over
good length, just outside off. Extra bounce surprises Ben. Defended gently towards cover
good length, on middle. And flicked off his waist, between the two fielders in the deep on the leg side... and neither can cut it off!
good length, outside off. Wants to cut it over point but misses
good length, on middle. Punched to cover for a quick single
good length, on leg stump. Worked off his hips to deep backward square. Fifty stand in 37 balls
good length just outside off. He looks to defend, but pulls the bat back. Past the edge to the keeper
slower ball, wide outside off. McDermott wanted to play the big shot, but past the edge and to the keeper. Drinks
good length, outside off, and cut to point
full on middle. Clears the front leg and slogs over deep midwicket
full outside off, and driven tio extra cover
good length, outside off. Cut well, but stopped with a dive at cover
full, outside leg. Misses the sweep, but collects the extra
full outside off, and he tees off! Golf swing, good connecting, and over long on
creams this through the covers! Too full and punished
appeal for lbw as he misses the reverse sweep. Hits him outside off
smart shot! Full, on the stumps, and he goes deep inside his crease before pulling along the ground to deep midwicket
good length, on off. Pulled off the back foot to cow corner
full on middle. Driven against the turn to long on
fuleading edge, soft catch at cover! Good length on off, and he wants to nudge it leg side, but the bat's face turns in his hand, takes the edge and McDermott is out
good length, outside off. Edged into the ground
good length, on middle. Defended fof the back foot
yorker length, outside off. Dug away to deep extra cover
fullish, outside off. Goes onto the back foot and defends towards point
good length, on off, and pulled to wide long on! Mid on's dive is futile
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face to third man
flicked to deep bakward square
full, on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
fullish, on off, and swept to deep midwicket
full on middle. And the googly is driven to wide long off
good length, on middle. Flicked to deep backward square
misses the stumping! Full outside off, and he goes for a straight drive. The ball goes under his blade, and he's out of the crease
full on middle and leg, and whipped to midwicket
full on middle, and flicked to the leg side
good length, on leg. Punched to midwicket for two
good length, just outside off. Tapped off the back foot to wide mid on
good length, outside leg. Flicked to the big gap near midwicket to take the second run
good length, on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
good length, on leg, and paddled behind square
back of a length, outside leg stump. Tries to pull but misses. Collects the wide though
good length, outside off. But cut straight to point! The fielder did not need to move
back of a length, on off. He ducks under it swiftly
good length, just outside off. Pulled along the ground to deep backward square
slower ball, full outside off. Goes for the big inside out drive, but edged to third man instead
good length, on leg. Flicked to fine leg
full on off. The googly is driven to wide long on
good length, on off stump. Reverse paddled to point
fullish, outside off. Drive finds cover
massive! Half-tracker on middle. He backs away, opens his stance, and pulls over deep midwicket
full on middle, and he goes for another big shot, but inside-edge past the keeper allows David to take two more
good length, outside off. Gloves it to point
soft! Slower ball on leg stump, and he wants to flick leg side. Ball goes under his bat, hits the front leg, and then ricochets onto leg stump
full outside off stump, bit of movement away. Plays and misses
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face and taps it to point
good length, outside off. He drags a pull that goes in the air, and deep midwicket takes a simple catch
good length on leg. Flicks, but misses. Hits his hip and the keeper dives to his left to stop any run
back of a length, on middle. Not quick enough to trouble him, and pulled behind square for a boundary
slower ball, good length and wide outside off. Ellis backed away and swung his bat. Bat and ball nowhere close
full and wide, just outside the tramlines. Ellis did not offer a shot, trying to collect the wide. He was successful
length ball on middle, and nudged to midwicket for a quick single

direct hit from the deep! Ellis might be short. This was a good length ball outside off, and he dragged it to deep midwicket. David calls for the two, but the throw the boundary hits the stumps at the bowler's end on the bounce. Ellis was quite far out, but atleast got David back on strike
low full toss outside off, and slapped to cover. Can't beat the infield though
hammered to deep midwicket. In the slot, and clobbered over the fielder at midwicket
has to rebowl that. Very short, very wide, and soaring over David's head despite him not ducking
good length, wide outside off. He stands tall and drags this pull from outside the stumps, and finds the gap at deep midwicket. Twelve off the 19th
gives David the strike. Full on leg, and tapped to point
that's four for Siddle! Slower, short ball on leg. David wants to swat it over the infield, but instead chops it onto his stumps. Siddle came around the wicket for this
over the wicket, yorker length, and that's cleaned up middle stump! Siddle takes five and Hurricanes are all out for 146
crunched straight of mid off! Very full, almost a yorker outside off stump and he just stood still and thumped it straight
length ball, he stands up and heaves this across the line through midwicket and a misfield allows for two

Bowled him! Inswinger through the gate smashes into middle and off. Faulkner sends him off too! The pair had exchanged words in the first two balls. This was a full length inswinger, Salt just swiped across the line leaving a huge gap between bat and pad and the stumps lit up
full outswinger, he mistimes a drive, dragging it to mid on
good length but far too wide of off and rightly called
leading edge flies safely through the gap at cover-point for a couple. It shaped nicely away from him and he reached a long way infront of his body and closed the face

flicked straight to deep square! The fielder was right there for it. It wasn't a great delivery, full on leg stump, he picked it off his pads and timed it beautifully but picked out Jacks on the rope!
lbw appeal but it might have pitched outside leg. 129kph, back of a length, pitching outside leg for sure, but it straightened and thudded into the pad
play and miss trying to square drive on the up through point
132kph, good length, he pushes firmly on the up to cover-point
135kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
back of a length, wide of off, he mistimes a cut to backward point
131kph, good length outside off, he check drives to mid off
full on off, and he checks a lofted shot over Faulkner's head. Clears mid off too, but doesn't go for four
good length, outside off, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full on his pads. Inside-edged to square leg
full on leg, swinging down. Flicked to short fine leg for a dangerous (but quick) single

big appeal for caught behind but the umpire says no. Fullish, outside off, and he presses forward to defend. Nips back, through to the keeper. Hobart were convinced that came off the bat's inside edge, but replays suggest that it took a tickle off his pocket
good length, just outside off and angling in again. Hits his front leg and rolls away to point
full ball, and crunched past the bowler to long off. Big effort from Ingram trying to pull it back
full, on off, and defended towards cover
good length, outside leg stump. Clipped fine, and it races away for four!
full on middle, and angling slightly across. Defended with the full face of the bat. Soft hands
full on middle, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket
bouncer, quick, and he's slow to pull. Hits the helmet en route to fine leg. The docs will have a check between overs
gentle dibbly-dobbly delivery outside off, and he fishes at it trying to punch square. Misses
full on off, and he gets inside the line of the ball before driving to mid on
full, just outside off. Defended off the front foot to cover
good length on off, but with some extra bounce this time. Uncomfortably defended from near his chest off the back foot
full just outside off, and clobbered straight back. Faulkner gets fingertips to it on the followthrough but drops the catch. Ball goes through to long off
good end to the over fo the Strikers! Full, on his legs, and flicked very hard, behind square, enough to beat fine leg
good length, on off from around the wicket. He gets down on one knee and gets it in the gap behind square leg for four!
caught? No, just short of Handscomb at mid off. Full outside off, and he sliced a straight drive that nearly got him dismissed
worked to point for a quick single
good length, just outside off, and worked in front of square for a jogging single
up and over! Tossed up, and Carey skips down the ground before lofting it confidently over long on. Does not over hit it, a very precise shot
drags this to deep midwicket and keeps the strike for next over
full and wide, with Carey backing away. Too far for him to make any good connection. Sliced to point
that's two dots in a row...solid start from Ellis. Full on off and moving away after pitching. Carey tries to exploit the extra cover region but can't connect
full on leg, and whipped in front of square. Wide long on runs in to keep it down to two
full on off, and pushed to the bowler's left. But Ellis gets his hand to it, and then recovers to pick it up
full on leg, and drilled to wide long on
deft! Length ball on leg, and Carey opens his bat's face at the last moment to guide a shot between the keeper and short third man
good length, on off, and guided to deep point
good length, outside off, and guided to third man
works this length ball to point
goes for an expansive shot, but ends up slicing it over the infield on the off side. They jog back for two
fifty partnership up as he pushes this in front of square on the off side
good length, on leg stump. Fended towards cover, and off they go for a single
good length on middle, and leg. Defended off the back foot
length ball on middle. Punched to long on
good length, on middle. He opens the bat's face and slaps this past point! Man at third man can't get to it either. Carey growing in confidence
slower ball, short and wide. Carey offers no shot and collects the extra run
stump to stump, length ball, and defended with soft hands
chance of a run out but Carey was quick to get back for the second. Had cut it to deep point and called early for the double
good length on middle, Turning across, and nudged to midwicket off the back foot
full on off, and he sweeps this against the turn to deep backward square
good length, outside off and turning away. Stands tall and punches this past Short to long off
full outside off, and he drags another sweep to deep backward square leg
good length, on off, and defended back towards the non-striker
good length, on off. Stands tall and cuts in front of square. Fielding effort in the deep ensures it does not go for four
good length, outside off. Tapped with soft hands to midwicket for a single
edged! Length ball, outside off, and Carey backs away to cut. But it takes an edge, and goes past the vacant slip cordon for four
good length, just outside off. Tapped to point for a quick single
fuller just outside off, and defended off the back foot to cover
length ball outside off. Cuts to point and gets to fifty
clears long on! Slower ball on off, and he went through with the shot, but was just slightly mistimed. But enough to clear the boundary line
full, outside leg stump, and skidding through. Wide given
guides this to point for a quick run
full, on middle. Soft hand defense to the off side...and off they go for a single
full on leg stump, and it hits his pads before rolling over to square leg
full toss, on the knee roll. Punched to long on
good length, on leg. Flicked past short fine leg, who can't intercept it, and that's a four for Weatherald
crunched! Short, not fast enough, and he stands back before pulling over deep midwicket!

good length, outside off, and he slaps a cut over the vacant slip cordon. Boland dives and intercepts at third man, and the throw nearly gets Weatherald run out at the batsman's end. He survives...and that's their third 100th run stand. All their 100-run stands have been against Hobart Hurricanes
full, just outside off. Driven past point, and the man in the deep is spectator. Runs are flowing now
good length on middle. He shuffles across the stumps and then blocks off the back foot
good length, on leg stump. Flicked to square leg
full, outside leg. He makes room and clips it square. Finds midwicket though
short ish ball, on middle. Makes room and tries to ramp it over the keeper. No connection made
length ball, angling across, and he plays a late cut to third man

around the wicket. Length ball, on off, and he mistimes the pull! Pops in the air, and taken by Short at midwicket. Carey falls after a successful day with the bat. But gives the Hurricanes a small glimmer of hope
full on middle, and flicked in front of square. Protection there at deep midwicket though
full outside off, and defended with the bat's open face. Stopped at point
good length outside off, and he wants to play the late cut, but the ball goes past his outside edge
good length on off. Tapped towards midwicket, keeping Weatherald on 49
half-tracker on off and turning further away from the right-hander. Drags this square to deep midwicket
tenth T20 fifty for Weatherald. Length ball turning away and he slices a cut over the fielder at cover
good length, outside leg. He opens his stance and muscles a pull behind square in the deep
overpitched outside off, and he comes down the wicket to convert the ball into a full toss. Looks to drive, but takes the thick outside edge past the keeper to third man
falls short of long off! This was a half-tracker that he tried to flat-bat over the bowler. Mistimed, and that's probably good for the batsman, because otherwise he was holing out
tapped to the leg side, and off they go for a quick single. But the gloveman scurries across, picks it up and has a shy at the keeper's stumps. Misses
full on leg stump. Misses the flick, hits his boot, and the keeper dives to his left to intercept
good length on off, and some extra bounce hits Wells near his glove. Surprised by the combination of extra pace + bounce
full outside off, and a square drive to deep point for one
good pace, 152.1kph and almost takes the edge to the keeper. Length ball on middle, and he wants to play the late cut but can't
good length, outside leg, and he wants to pull, but doesn't connect. Weatherald wants a wide, but the umpire says no
good length, on middle, and he whips this off the hip over deep backward square leg! Sign of a confident batsman. He's making it a habit of hitting sixes off the over's last delivery
low full toss on off, and he slices the drive past the diving point fielder. Man in the deep cleans up
good length, on leg stump, and angling further down
good length, on middle and leg. Clipped to square leg, but no chance of a single
full just outside off, and slapped towards mid off, but falls short of the fielder there
good length, on middle. Tapped to deep midwicket for a walking run
full, outside leg stump. And absolutely whipped off his boots over the square leg boundary
good length, on middle. Defends with soft hands...off the back foot
good length, outside leg, and going further down. Five needed to win
good length, on middle. Ticked around the corner to square leg for a single
good length, outside off, from around the wicket. Guided down to third man
good length, outside off. Smartly cut, but finds point
full, on off, and inside-edges this onto his pads. But Weatherald calls for the single, and Wells obliges
full on middle, and he walks across to try and clip it behind square. Misses, hits his pad, but the lbw appeal is turned down
and they lose a wicket first ball. Length ball, and Wells tries to clear mid on. Mistimed, and a smart catch running back
good length, on middle. He swivels and pulls along the ground to deep backward square
full on middle, and chipped to mid on! Golden duck. A bit of swing into Short, and he failed to clear the mid-on fielder
full on leg, and flicked towards square leg. Adelaide Strikers win by five wickets
